segments.text: I'm observing the two children near the cabinets, planning their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on that wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is stretched up and deep inside the cookie jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl reaching up with an open palm, waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are clearly working together in this secret operation, a true partnership.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed and tilted; it looks like it's about to give way at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a jolt of fear for the boy's safety up there, so high and unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clever but very risky way to get to those forbidden treats, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the cookies myself, just seeing them being pulled out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little conspiracy is quite charming, despite the potential danger of falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt from that unstable, tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must really, really want those cookies to go through such an effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame their determined figures perfectly, like a stage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me fondly of childhood escapades and secret pleasures.
segments.speaker: PAR
